root.name: Android One
root.description: The first game developed by Costa Panayi that involved taking the android through 2d screens shooting enemy mutants and blasting through destructible walls in order to reach a central reactor and destroy it. The game was set against a time limit before the reactor blew up and gave you 5 lives to destroy the reactor. It had various difficulty levels as well as a high score mechanism. The success of the game led to Android Two.
